I was very happy with the speech of filmmaker @AnnaMuylaert, awarded by the thrilling movie "What time it comes back" https://t.co/BtBS7Ih4a8
The director recounted her journey of discovering many Jessica who, like the character in the film, realized the dream of entering a university
Our programs - from my government and from the Lula government - extended access and enabled the children of domestic children to attend higher education.
From 13 years to now, the face of the universities has changed. Today it is more plural, colorful, democratic - as it should be.
By 2014, for example, 35% of higher education graduates were the first of their families to reach university.
Advances like this will not be barred and we will continue to expand opportunities so that more and more Brazilians have a better future.
